thread.title: Vikings expect decision on Greenway's future soon
thread.title_full: Vikings expect decision on Greenway's future soon

title: Vikings expect decision on Greenway's future soon
text:
Vikings expect decision on Greenway’s future soon A decision on Chad Greenway's future in the NFL could be coming soon. Bruce Kluckhohn/Bruce Kluckhohn-USA TODAY Sports Mar 2, 2017 at 5:03p ET 0Shares 
Longtime linebacker Chad Greenway is still contemplating his NFL future. The Minnesota Vikings think he’ll make a decision within the next week. 
“Obviously he’ll want to get the decision done before the start of free agency,” coach Mike Zimmer said. 
Players can start signing with new teams next Thursday. 
Greenway has spent 10 seasons in Minnesota since being selected in the first round, 17th overall, in 2007 out of Iowa. 
He has made two Pro Bowls and had 18 sacks, 11 interceptions, eight forced fumbles and 11 fumble recoveries, and has been a team leader for most of his stay with the Vikings. 0
